review.title: “Best recruiting firm to work at in Japan”
review.pros: Pros – Teamwork, great location, excellent database, spirit, quality clients, challenging and rewarding opportunity for those who are willing to do the work it take to succeed in the world of recruiting.Recruiting isn't the right job for everybody, but I Search Worldwide K.K. will train their recruiters, guide them, mentor them, and do everything possible to ensure that everbody is a success. The atmosphere is friendly, at times intense, and an atmosphere of success and integrity.
review.cons: Cons – No cons - I Search is a great place to work, but you do have to have the desire to succeed!
review.advice-to-management: Yes, I would recommend this company to a friend – I'm optimistic about the outlook for this company
